headline.main: THE RELIGIOUS WORLD.; THE METHODIST GENERAL CONFERENCE. A Trip to Niagara Falls--The Reports on Slavery--The Majority and Minority by the Ears--The Charges against a Bishop Dismissed--The Case of Slaveholder Quinn--The Committee on Slavery--The Minority Report Modified--More Bishops Wanted--Hoops and Slaveholding--No more Supernumerary Preachers--A Presentation Reports.

docs.snippet: ACADEMY OF MUSIC. Though the "season" at this Opera-house came to an end on Saturday, a special performance will be given to-morrow evening for the benefit of Mlle. SPERANZA.
docs.lead_paragraph: ACADEMY OF MUSIC. Though the "season" at this Opera-house came to an end on Saturday, a special performance will be given to-morrow evening for the benefit of Mlle. SPERANZA.

docs.snippet: ITEMS. The house occupied by Mr. CANE, at No. 221 Court-street, was entered by thieves Saturday, who carried away two watches, chains, , valued in all at $125.... The thirty-first anniversary of the Brooklyn Sociable School Union will be cele- brated...
docs.lead_paragraph: ITEMS. The house occupied by Mr. CANE, at No. 221 Court-street, was entered by thieves Saturday, who carried away two watches, chains, , valued in all at $125.... The thirty-first anniversary of the Brooklyn Sociable School Union will be cele- brated to-morrow, weather permitting.

docs.snippet: Mr. HALE, of New-Hampshire, (Rep.,) introduced a bill to alier and improve the construction of the Senate chamber. Referred to a select committee.
docs.lead_paragraph: Mr. HALE, of New-Hampshire, (Rep.,) introduced a bill to alier and improve the construction of the Senate chamber. Referred to a select committee.

headline.main: Where the Rich and where the Poor Pass the Summer.

docs.snippet: The steamship Philadelphia arrived at this port yesterday morning, from Havana on the 12th inst. The health of Havana was good.

headline.main: From Havana.; ARRIVAL OF THE PHILADELPHIA HAVANA MARKETS, ETC.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamship Philadelphia arrived at this port yesterday morning, from Havana on the 12th inst. The health of Havana was good.

docs.snippet: To-day the Japanese Embassadors visited the Secretary of State at his office, and presented their credentials. To-morrow they visit the President and Diplomatic Corps, and after that they will be at liberty to receive municipal ovations.

headline.main: ABOUT THE STRANGERS.; THE VISIT TO THE PRESIDENT AND SECRETARY OF STATE CEREMONIES AND EXCLUSIVENESS WHAT THE NEW-YORK DELEGATION IS DOING JAPANESE PECULIARITIES.

docs.lead_paragraph: To-day the Japanese Embassadors visited the Secretary of State at his office, and presented their credentials. To-morrow they visit the President and Diplomatic Corps, and after that they will be at liberty to receive municipal ovations.

headline.main: Great Trotting Match.; ETHAN ALLEN AND GEORGE M. PATCHEN ON THE UNION COURSE PATCHEN THE VICTOR. [Communicated.] For Consideration at Chicago.
